name: Architected Heroes
description:
This game is a project make for the Brave Jam 2020 organized by the forum Condado Braveheart, a Jam who the theme is Controle o jogo, e não o jogador ( Control the game, not the player).

In this game you control a god in a world devasted for a demon Lord,  and the rules you create says : you cannot interfere directly in the world. So, you create heroes who can destroy the devil.

I pretender to make new versions of the game until its a really good game, probably. :)

Ps - This version is Pt-br only
